name: THE GAME BETA 0.1
description:
README:

- THIS IS NOT A VIRUS DON'T WORRY, THIS GAME IS MADE WITH UNITY GAME ENGINE A BIG COMPANY AND A TRUSTWORTHY PLATFORM

- DOUBLE CLICK THE ZIP TO OPEN THE FILE

- CLICK "VIRUS".EXE TO START PLAYING

-  "TO EXIT THE GAME JUST ALT + F4"

CONTROLS:

- WASD TO WALK,

- WASD + LEFT SHIFT TO SPRINT,

- PRESS E TO INTERACT WITH STUFF,

- SCROLL WHEEL TO SWITCH INVENTORY SLOTS,

- LEFT MOUSE BUTTON TO ATTACK WITH A WEAPON

- ENJOY! :)
